=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Microblade Eyebrow Pencil for tat brow look, Microblading Eyebrow Pen make up, Tattoo Pen for Every Skin Type with Long Lasting Quality, Waterproof Brow Pen Chestnut-Dark Brown
Review Date: 2019/07/08
Store: Music Flower
Product Description: ['Cloud Retailers Presents', 'Music Flower Eyebrow Tattoo Pen Microblading-3D Fork Tip', 'This new and revolutionary smudge-proof long lasting eyebrow pen features a micro fork tip applicator that creates hair-like strokes lasting all day to hopefully replace the old-school pencils.', 'Regarding Colors:', 'Dark Grey is recommended for Black/Dark Grey eyebrows.', 'Dark Grey is recommended for Black/Dark Grey eyebrows.', 'Brown is recommended for Brown/Auburn eyebrows (this is a Reddish Brown).', 'Brown is recommended for Brown/Auburn eyebrows (this is a Reddish Brown).', 'Chestnut is recommended for Brown/Dark Blonde eyebrows (Cool Brown).', 'Chestnut is recommended for Brown/Dark Blonde eyebrows (Cool Brown).', 'INSTRUCTIONS:', 'Note: After applying once you achieve the desired shape allow the pigmentation to dry.', 'Step 1: Start with clean and dry skin. Do not apply after putting lotion on, this will make the eyebrow pen less effective.', 'Step 1:', 'Start with clean and dry skin.', 'Do not apply after putting lotion on', ', this will make the eyebrow pen less effective.', "Step 2: Use a light hand, don't press hard. Raise the pen tip 45 degrees and gently draw along the growth direction of the eyebrows (If your eyebrows are not sparse, you can also draw straight across your eyebrows to create a fuller look.)", 'Step 2:', "Use a light hand, don't press hard. Raise the pen tip 45 degrees and gently draw along the growth direction of the eyebrows (If your eyebrows are not sparse, you can also draw straight across your eyebrows to create a fuller look.)", 'Step 3: Fill the eyebrows with the wide part of the pen.', 'Step 3:', 'Fill the eyebrows with the wide part of the pen.', 'Step 4: For the end of your brow, tilt the pen to fill the area with the narrower part of the pen.', 'Step 4:', 'For the end of your brow, tilt the pen to fill the area with the narrower part of the pen.', 'Step 5: Correct any mistakes to get your desired shape and then let it dry for a few seconds.', 'Step 5:', 'Correct any mistakes to get your desired shape and then let it dry for a few seconds.', 'Initially it will be slightly wet but that gives you the chance to fix any mistakes.', 'STORAGE', 'Use and store with the tip positioned lower than the end of the pen to ease and prolong its use as this is similar to a marker or pen. Also, always close cap tightly.', "Enjoy this unique fork like design enabling you to get perfectly defined, naturally beautiful, hair-like brows that WOW. If you have any questions on how to use the product please don't hesitate to contact us."]
Average Rating: 3.7
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Music Flower', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Special Feature': 'Waterproof, Long Lasting, Smudge Pro', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.92 x 0.98 x 0.43 inches; 0.63 Ounces', 'UPC': '732068058937'}
Review Text: I disliked it because it was dried up and dry flakes were all over the place. I tried using it to try and fill in my missing eyebrows.
Review Title: Very dried up!!
Rating: 1.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
**Shopping Preferences and Trends:**

1. **Hair Care Products**: A strong inclination towards moisturizing and conditioning hair products is evident, particularly from brands like African Pride and Aussie. Experience with these items suggests a preference for solutions that effectively address dry and damaged hair.

2. **Eyebrow Products**: The person frequently purchases eyebrow enhancement tools, signifying a keen interest in brow grooming. However, their experiences show dissatisfaction with several eyebrow pens due to issues such as dryness, difficulty in application, and lack of longevity.

3. **Mixed Satisfaction**: While some products received high ratings, others were notably criticized. This suggests a willingness to experiment with new brands and types but also a tendency to be disappointed by performance inconsistencies.

4. **Brand Loyalty**: There appears to be a pattern of returning to specific brands like African Pride and Aussie for hair-related products, showing a level of brand loyalty when satisfied.

5. **Overall Quality Concerns**: The buyer's feedback often reflects a critical view on product quality, especially in terms of durability and effectiveness, indicating a preference for long-lasting and reliable items.

This analysis emphasizes a focus on hair care efficacy, particularly for dry hair, alongside a venture into eyebrow grooming, albeit with some inconsistency in product satisfaction.

target_interaction.title: Stays on a long time.
target_interaction.text: I am 55 years old and have used many many different brands of nail polish. This is the best I have ever used.
target_interaction.title_meta: Orly Nail Lacquer - ELECTRIC ESCAPE Summer 2021 Collection - Pick Any Color .6oz/18ml (OR2000099 - Synthetic Symphony)
